item.title: About
item.author: zach@bluecollarcoding.ca (Zach Ramsay)
item.description: With a knack for building things since an early age, I recently returned to my first true passion of carpentry. This site serves as an archive of all my projects. Spending my 20s in academia then tech, the thing that always made me the most happy was working on fun DIY projects. In the spring/summer of 2019, we built a beautiful 200ft fence around the property I manage … and by August I was ready to take my construction skills to the next level.

item.title: Fences
item.author: zach@bluecollarcoding.ca (Zach Ramsay)
item.description: The old fence was in disarray: The design for the fence came from a colleague, who also recommended the same sawmill. Getting wood direct from the source is both cheaper and higher quality.

item.title: Chicken Coops
